languages.text: "Не найдется у тебя чуточку могильного лотоса, госпо{mf|дин|жа}? Мне бы только забыться..."
"Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."
languages.original_text: "Не найдется у тебя чуточку могильного лотоса, госпо{mf|дин|жа}? Мне бы только забыться..."

traits.locale_text: "Could you spare have just a dash of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to forget..."
"Could you spare have just a dash of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to forget..."
"Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to fall into oblivion..."
"Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to fall into oblivion..."
"Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."
"Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."

languages.text: 「強き{mf|お方|ご婦人}よ、グレイヴロータスをほんの少しだけ分けてもらえませんか？私は暫くの間、ただ漂っていたいんです…」
languages.original_text: "Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."

traits.locale_text: 「強き{mf|お方|ご婦人}よ、グレイヴロータスをほんの少しだけ分けてもらえませんか？私は暫くの間、ただ漂っていたいんです…」

languages.text: “可以给我一剂墓穴莲花吗，强大的{mf|主人|女主人}？我只想把一切都抛到脑后……”
languages.original_text: "Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."

traits.locale_text: “可以给我一剂墓穴莲花吗，强大的{mf|主人|女主人}？我只想一忘皆空……”

languages.text: «¿Me da un poco de loto de la tumba, {mf|señor|señora}? Necesito olvidar todo un rato...».
languages.original_text: "Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Me da un poco de loto de la tumba, {mf|señor|señora}? Necesito olvidarme de quién soy...».

languages.text: "Könntet Ihr eine kleine Prise Grablotus entbehren, {mf|starker Herr|starke Herrin}? Ich muss nur eine Weile dahintreiben .."
languages.original_text: "Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."

traits.locale_text: "Könntet Ihr eine kleine Prise Grablotus entbehren, {mf|starker Herr|starke Herrin}? Ich muss vergessen ..."

languages.text: « Vous auriez un peu de lotus tumulaire, {mf|maître|maîtresse} ? J'ai comme une envie de tout oublier quelque temps... »
languages.original_text: "Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous auriez un peu de lotus mortuaire, {mf|maître|maîtresse} ? J'ai comme une envie de sombrer dans l'oubli... »

languages.text: "Bana azıcık mezar nilüferi bahşeder misin güçlü {mf|beyim|hanımım}? Biraz uzaklaşasım var..."
languages.original_text: "Could you spare just a modicum of grave lotus, strong {mf|master|mistress}? I just need to drift away for a while..."

traits.locale_text: "Bana azıcık mezar nilüferi bahşeder misin güçlü {mf|beyim|hanımım}? Biraz uzaklaşasım var..."
